name: ITR
description: Streamline your tax season with the ITR Assistant by HERE AND NOW AI. This powerful, secure tool automates the tedious process of collecting documents for your Income Tax Return (ITR). It connects to your Gmail, automatically finds password-protected financial statements (Bank, Credit Card, Demat & more), decrypts them, and organizes everything into neat folders in your Google Drive. Stop wasting hours on manual downloads and focus on what matters. Built for tax professionals and individuals who value speed and security. Your data never leaves your Google account, ensuring 100% privacy.
tags: ITR Document Collector, Automate Tax Documents, Simplify ITR Filing, Tax Consultant Tool, Financial Statement Organizer
